# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/sendgrid`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for sendgrid (https://github.com/sendgrid/sendgrid-nodejs).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/sendgrid

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 12 Dec 2016 22:50:19 GMT
 * Library Dependencies: none
 * Module Dependencies: smtpapi
 * Global values: none
